meanings: (떨어지지 않게) stick, attach, (formal) affix; (풀로) paste, glue

examples.korean: a brick building faced with stone 발음듣기 표면에 돌을 붙인 벽돌 건물 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: a brick building faced with stone 발음

examples.korean: Schubert’s setting of a poem by Goethe 발음듣기 괴테의 시에 슈베르트가 붙인 곡 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Schubert’s setting of a poem by Goethe 발음

examples.korean: I put a lighted match to the letter and watched it burn. 발음듣기 나는 불을 붙인 성냥을 그 편지에 갖다 대고 그것이 타는 것을 지켜보았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I put a lighted match to the letter and watched it burn. 발음

examples.korean: Please enclose an sae for your test results. 발음듣기 테스트 결과를 받아 보시려면 우표를 붙인 회신용 봉투를 동봉해서 보내 주십시오. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Please enclose an sae for your test results. 발음

examples.korean: a manufacturer's marks on his wares 발음듣기 세공품에 붙인 제조자의 마크. Friendict Level English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: a manufacturer's marks on his wares 발음
